price: [Dios dirá a los ángeles:] "Arrojen al Infierno a todo aquel que se haya negado obstinadamente a creer,
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
